title: You know what's the best about every worlds?
body:
The damn theme and music along with the hype and the new Meta.

Yes, I'm bored to the point I'm waiting for LCS (Worlds)

Now down vote this thread to hell guys.

replies.body: whats so wrong with liking the music someone made while inspired by an event and the prospect of a new meta?

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KXJk4sFA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-18T09:56:16.276+0000)
>
> whats so wrong with liking the music someone made while inspired by an event and the prospect of a new meta?

The boards hate threads that is not related to the popular champions so I expected to be down-voted.
Coulld someone fill me in on when Worlds starts? I know we just started the summer split a few weeks ago.

> [{quoted}](name=Triple3T,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KXJk4sFA,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-06-18T19:41:40.228+0000)
>
> Coulld someone fill me in on when Worlds starts? I know we just started the summer split a few weeks ago.

It starts in November and ends in December.

Does anybody remeber the old champselect theme song? 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jO5jOv_BkNg
Imo this is the best theme song riot has ever made. But I'm sad it retired-.-
I haven't cared enough to watch more than one or two matches this year. Where are we? Still Regional, regional duking for world spots? Fill me in, I wanna bask in the hype again.
Yeah I'm always on the lookout for the new Worlds theme song, Riot always picks good stuff

> [{quoted}](name=Primordial Hydra,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KXJk4sFA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-18T10:21:20.423+0000)
>
> YeahI'm always on the lookout for the new Worlds theme song, Riot always picks good stuff

Cool.
